name: to-do-app-backend
description: Backend for the Todo portfolio app

scripts.create-db: aws dynamodb create-table --table-name todos --attribute-definitions AttributeName=id,AttributeType=S --key-schema AttributeName=id,KeyType=HASH --provisioned-throughput ReadCapacityUnits=1,WriteCapacityUnits=1 --region eu-north-1 --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000 > logs/create-db.log
scripts.populate-db: aws dynamodb put-item --table-name todos --item '{"id": {"S": "test-id"}, "title": {"S": "Test Todo"}, "description": {"S": "This is a test item"}, "createdAt": {"N": "1721400000000"}}' --region eu-north-1 --endpoint-url http://localhost:8000
scripts.setup-and-run-local: pnpm run create-db && pnpm run populate-db && pnpm run local-server

author: Julian Grey
